content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Stone Furnace Array
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace (position x1)
- Stone furnace (position x2)

### Coal and Iron Ore Processing
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace (position x1) with iron ore inserted
- Stone furnace (position x2) with iron ore inserted
- Stone furnace (position x1) with coal inserted
- Stone furnace (position x2) with coal inserted

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when inserting items into furnaces
- Ensure that the furnace is available and not busy before inserting items.
- Check if the furnace has enough space for the inserted items.

### Errors when extracting items from furnaces
- Verify that the furnace has the items available for extraction before attempting to extract.
- Make sure to approach the furnace to ensure proper extraction.

### General Inventory Management
- Regularly check your inventory to ensure you have enough resources for crafting and inserting into machines.
